Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Horemakhbit with painted detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face with black eyes, crossed arms in relief holding two black hoes, the legs are inscribed with two columns of black painted Hieroglyphs separated by a central line, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
